message:
SYSTEM: RDF%28S%29.pdf: Página 52
Patterns on named graphs
# Named graph: http://example.org/foaf/aliceFoaf
@prefix foaf:<http://.../foaf/0.1/> .
@prefix rdf:<http://.../1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .
@prefix rdfs:<http://.../2000/01/rdf-schema#> .
_:a  foaf:name     "Alice" .
:a  foaf:mbox     <mailto:alice@work.example> .
_
p
_:a  foaf:knows    _:b .
_:b  foaf:name     "Bob" .
_:b  foaf:mbox     <mailto:bob@work.example> .
_:b  foaf:nick     "Bobby" .
_:b  rdfs:seeAlso  <http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf> .
<http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf>
rdf:type      foaf:PersonalProfileDocument .
# Named graph: http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf
@prefix foaf:<http://.../foaf/0.1/> .
@prefix rdf:<http://
/1999/02/22 rdf syntax ns#>

103
RDF and RDF Schema
@prefix rdf:<http://.../1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .
@prefix rdfs:<http://.../2000/01/rdf-schema#> .
_:z  foaf:mbox     <mailto:bob@work.example> .
_:z  rdfs:seeAlso  <http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf> .
_:z  foaf:nick     "Robert" .
<http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf>
rdf:type      foaf:PersonalProfileDocument .
Patterns on named graphs II
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
SELECT ?src ?bobNick
FROM NAMED <http://example.org/foaf/aliceFoaf>
FROM NAMED <http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf>
WHERE
src
bobNick
<http://example.org/foaf/aliceFoaf>
"Bobby"
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX data: <http://example.org/foaf/>
SELECT ?nick
FROM NAMED <htt
//
l
/f
f/ li
F
f>
WHERE
{
GRAPH ?src
{ ?x foaf:mbox <mailto:bob@work.example> .
?x foaf:nick ?bobNick
}
}
<http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf>
"Robert"
© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
104
RDF and RDF Schema
FROM NAMED <http://example.org/foaf/aliceFoaf>
FROM NAMED <http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf>
WHERE
{
GRAPH data:bobFoaf {
?x foaf:mbox <mailto:bob@work.example> .
?x foaf:nick ?nick }
}
nick
"Robert"
